author: davidlt
body:
13 Clang warnings popup while building `DataFormats/TrackerRecHit2D`
dictionary with ROOT 6.04 and above. Example:

```
warning: 'recHits' overrides a member function but is not marked
'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
```

The patch cleans all 13 warnings.

Signed-off-by: David Abdurachmanov David.Abdurachmanov@cern.ch
title: DataFormats/TrackerRecHit2D: clean Clang override warnings
